name: Diamond Abduct R
description:
Fight off an aggressive alien race while trying to steal their precious jewels.

A small remake of a game I made about a year ago, where you need to fight against alien enemies, while trying to collect diamonds to raise your score. It is nothing great, but I would greatly appreciate any form of feedback    

WASD or arrow keys to move and navigate the menu, space to fire and select. Press ctrl to go into fullscreen.
